byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Canada's first immigration ship, Canadian Pacific Steamships' Diesel-electric vessel Beaverbrae, is now en route from St. John, N.B., to London and Bremerhaven, according to an announcement last week. A former German submarine depot-repair ship in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's first immigration ship, Canadian Pacific Steamships' Diesel-electric vessel Beaverbrae, is now en route from St. John, N.B., to London and Bremerhaven, according to an announcement last week. A former German submarine depot-repair ship in World War II, the vessel-has been extensively reconditioned and has accommodations for 773 displaced persons and other immigrants on each westbound voyage.
docs.abstract: SS Beaverbrae on way to Eur to pick up immigrants; earlier trips revd

headline.main: Shipping News and Notes; Canada's First Immigration Ship En Route to Bring European Refugees to Dominion

docs.snippet: The response of the foreign exchange market to the calendar of events of international significance generated out of receding values for stocks and commodities here and England's wage stabilization and price control program was a pattern of rates...
docs.lead_paragraph: The response of the foreign exchange market to the calendar of events of international significance generated out of receding values for stocks and commodities here and England's wage stabilization and price control program was a pattern of rates ranging from irregularly lower in some units to a sharply deflated value for the pound sterling.

docs.snippet: TWO years after Argentine voters swept him into office on Feb. 24, 1946, President Juan Domingo Peron is back in the good graces of the United States and the hemisphere. Pending next month's important Congressional elections, he has full control of...
docs.lead_paragraph: TWO years after Argentine voters swept him into office on Feb. 24, 1946, President Juan Domingo Peron is back in the good graces of the United States and the hemisphere. Pending next month's important Congressional elections, he has full control of the situation on the Rio de la Ptata.

headline.main: Peron: Evolution of a Strong Man; Two years after his election as President of Argentina 'his villainous guise has been made heroic by a change in lighting.'

docs.snippet: IF religious, moral or physiological scruples preclude your nibbling hasheesh, a brief survey indicates that the same effect can be obtained by a little serious attention to Hollywood's animal lore.
docs.lead_paragraph: IF religious, moral or physiological scruples preclude your nibbling hasheesh, a brief survey indicates that the same effect can be obtained by a little serious attention to Hollywood's animal lore.
docs.abstract: Comment on animals in Hollywood films

headline.main: TOSSING A MONKEY WRENCH INTO FILMDOM'S ANIMAL ANNALS; Being a Distillation of the Fabulous Fables Invented by Press Agents Over the Years and Offered as Whole Truths

docs.snippet: The spectre of devaluation of the pound sterling was uppermost in the minds of bankers and dealers in foreign exchange last week, and notwithstanding official disclaimers of any intention of adopting this course -- for the present at least -- it did...
docs.lead_paragraph: The spectre of devaluation of the pound sterling was uppermost in the minds of bankers and dealers in foreign exchange last week, and notwithstanding official disclaimers of any intention of adopting this course -- for the present at least -- it did have an unfavorable effect upon the pound, particularly in forward contracts.

docs.snippet: Port congestion in Souh American harbors, a source of concern to American shippers since the end of the war, shows no sign of immediate improvement, James L. Bates declared here yesterday. He is chief of the technical department of the United States...
docs.lead_paragraph: Port congestion in Souh American harbors, a source of concern to American shippers since the end of the war, shows no sign of immediate improvement, James L. Bates declared here yesterday. He is chief of the technical department of the United States Maritime Commission.
docs.abstract: US Maritime Comm aide J L Bates says congestion persists, 4 ports, S America; blames labor

headline.main: SHIP LAG PERSISTS IN SOUTH AMERICA; Port Delays Are Laid to Quality of Waterfront Labor by U.S. Agent on the Argentina

docs.snippet: Declines in credit and collection ratings for the second time in six and one-half years was indicated by the thirty-ninth semi-annual survey of credit and collection in Latin America markets for the last half of 1947 conducted by the Foreign Credit...
docs.lead_paragraph: Declines in credit and collection ratings for the second time in six and one-half years was indicated by the thirty-ninth semi-annual survey of credit and collection in Latin America markets for the last half of 1947 conducted by the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau of the National Association ofh)0*0*0*iCredit Men.

headline.main: CREDIT DROP NOTED IN LATIN AMERICA; Bureau Study Reports Lower Rating in 18 Markets With 14 Showing Collections Down
